fields.name: AppConsistentFrequencyInMinutes
fields.description: The app consistent snapshot frequency (in minutes).

fields.name: MultiVMSyncStatus
fields.description: A value indicating whether multi-VM sync has to be enabled. Value should be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

fields.name: RecoveryPointHistory
fields.description: The duration in minutes until which the recovery points need to be stored.

fields.name: RecoveryPointThresholdInMinutes
fields.description: The recovery point threshold in minutes.
